comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Yvette Guilbert (20 January 1865 in Paris – 3 February 1944 in Aix-en-Provence) was a French cabaret singer and actress of the Belle Époque." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yvette_Guilbert

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: In February 1916, she was in the USA, see article in The Washington times., February 04, 1916, HOME EDITION, Page 10, with photo. 2/17/16 is the date on this photograph:

comment._content: B-59: Thanks for the further info on Guilbert. We will expand this record to reflect some of those details.
